message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value for us, reflecting its quality and uniqueness. We are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $500000. We believe this price reflects the true worth of the product while providing you with a great opportunity to acquire something truly special. We look forward to your consideration.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. While I appreciate the value you place on the product, I am seeking a more reasonable price given my budget constraints. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $200000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. In light of this, I am willing to consider a compromise. Our revised offer for the product is $300000. I hope this proposal better aligns with your financial considerations while still acknowledging the value of the product. Please let me know if this offer meets your needs.
